jsdp.app.lotsizing

Class sS_SequentialBackwardRecursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.Recursion
      • jsdp.sdp.BackwardRecursion
        • jsdp.app.lotsizing.sS_BackwardRecursion
          • jsdp.app.lotsizing.sS_SequentialBackwardRecursion
  • Deprecated. 
    Sample-based approaches are more efficient.

    @Deprecated
public class sS_SequentialBackwardRecursion
extends sS_BackwardRecursion
    A special purpose implementation of a backward recursion algorithm that exploits K-convexity to quickly process states.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

    • Constructor Detail

      • sS_SequentialBackwardRecursion

        public sS_SequentialBackwardRecursion(umontreal.ssj.probdist.Distribution[] demand,
                                      double fixedOrderingCost,
                                      double proportionalOrderingCost,
                                      double holdingCost,
                                      double penaltyCost)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an instance of a backward recursion algorithm that exploits K-convexity to quickly process states.
        Parameters:
        demand - the distribution of random demand in each period, an array of Distribution.
        fixedOrderingCost - the fixed ordering cost.
        proportionalOrderingCost - the proportional (per unit) ordering cost.
        holdingCost - the proportional (per unit) holding cost; this is paid for each item brought from one period to the next.
        penaltyCost - the proportional (per unit) penalty cost; this is paid for each item short at the end of each period.
